mapper.select: SELECT PA.maxVal AS maxVal , PA.minVal AS minVal , PA.avgVal AS avgVal , (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN A.ANSWER_OX = 'O' THEN 1 END)/COUNT(A.ANSWER_OX) FROM ANSWER A WHERE A.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq} GROUP BY A.PK_USER_SEQ) AS userVal FROM (SELECT MAX(ss) AS maxVal, MIN(ss) AS minVal, AVG(ss) AS avgVal FROM (SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN A.ANSWER_OX = 'O' THEN 1 END)/COUNT(A.ANSWER_OX) AS ss FROM ANSWER A GROUP BY A.PK_USER_SEQ) PA) PA;

SELECT SA.userVal AS userVal , MAX(SA.ss) AS maxVal , MIN(SA.ss) AS minVal , AVG(SA.ss) AS avgVal FROM (SELECT (SELECT SUM(A.ANSWER_NUM)/SUM(A.QUESTION_NUM) AS ss FROM AI_QUESTION_RESULT A WHERE A.PK_USER_SEQ = #{pkUserSeq} GROUP BY A.PK_USER_SEQ) AS userVal, SUM(A.ANSWER_NUM)/SUM(A.QUESTION_NUM) AS ss FROM AI_QUESTION_RESULT A GROUP BY A.PK_USER_SEQ) SA;
